mapper.select: select b.id bid, a.id aid, a.finishedflag, a.field0001 '编号', a.field0004 'from', a.field0025 '发起人', a.field0005 '时间', a.field0013 '获取需求工厂值', a.field0026 '罚款类别', a.field0014 '获取责任工序负责人', a.field0010 '品质异常描述', a.field0011 '品质异常处理方案', b.field0016 '罚款人', b.field0017 '罚款金额', b.field0018 '罚款人工号', b.field0019 '奖励人', b.field0020 '奖励金额', b.field0021 '奖励人工号' from formmain_0706 as a LEFT JOIN formson_0707 as b on a.ID=b.formmain_id where a.field0005 like CONCAT(#{parMap.workDate},'%')
